verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I will celebrate, sing unto the Lord newline Sing to the Lord a new song. newline I will celebrate, sing unto the Lord newline Sing to the Lord a new song.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: With my heart, rejoicing within newline With my mind focused on Him newline With my hands, raised to the heavens newline All I am, Worshipping Him.
